articles.author: Ashley Burke
articles.title: MPs call on Nav Canada to give up $7M in bonuses paid out during pandemic
articles.description: Politicians are calling on executives and management at Nav Canada to pay back $7 million in bonuses they received last year during the pandemic, while the private non-profit was tapping into government aid and warning of possible layoffs.
